title: Tempted
description: Book 2 in The BirthRight Series - A Sweet Upper YA / NA Paranormal Romance, perfect for fans of CHARMED! What if the very thing to save you--is the one thing beyond your reach?Torn between the two men who have fallen for her--and the evil who wants to possess her--twenty-year-old Chloe Bishop can no longer remember the fatal vision which threatens her future happiness. But when the magical link is severed between Chloe and her Wiccan family, they must find a way to save her, before temptation leads her into darkness, and into the welcoming arms of Mr. Wrong.CONTENT RATING: (PG 13)No sex, passionate kissing, moderate swearing, minimal violence
author: Brandi Leigh Hall
